author: ah
post_text: January 30, 2020 at 2:57 PM#1i am trying to edit effect lines through a macro but i cannot work out how or find the answer.for example i have an effect running and i want to trigger a macro that changes the number of groups in the effect, so it would change the groups line from 2 to 3 without going into the editor so i can change the groups while busking.is this a possibility?thanksAlex
title: edit effect lines through macros
